issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://grindr.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgrindr.com) ### Comment > AdGuard DNS no longer blocks ads in the Grindr app when I switched to the Native DNS mode intending to use along with Express VPN concurrently. comment.body: Due to internet firewall, I'm unable to test out ability of ad blocking without 3rd party VPN. I was also unable to connect to both AdGuard DNS and Express VPN at the same time using the Split-tunnel mode; AdGuard DNS would always be turned off automatically.

issue.title: www.emag.ro
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.emag.ro/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2F) ### Comment > Hi! Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. This I don't know if it's because of Adguard or not but it just became a problem in the past week, out of the blue. > > Thank you. Have a good day! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/8d9w10V.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9v1ISE3.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.10.2 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Referrer: | [https://www.emag.ro/history/shoppingdetails/265563020](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2Fhistory%2Fshoppingdetails%2F265563020)

comment.body:
> Hello, As far as I can see, most of these banners are loaded from ad servers, like `googlesyndication.com`, `doubleclick.net`, so it rather shouldn't be unblocked.
> 
> I have added a rule (filters update should be available in 1-2 hours) which should cause that banners which are not loaded by ad servers should be displayed (like on a screenshot below), but clearing cache or refreshing website using `Ctrl+F5` might be required.
> 
> Screenshot
> If you want to see banners from ad servers then please disable protection on this website.

So I did disable protection, in Chrome, for this site, I've deleted the cookies and browsing data and I still only see those banners if I'm logged out on the eMag site. If I disable Adguard protection completely  on my windows system, the banner is working....

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://soft98.ir/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsoft98.ir%2F) ### Comment Username: @SCRw66 > Hello > 1- Your Extention (AdGuard) causes the loading speed of sites to slow down a bit. > 2- Your Extention (AdGuard) causes some sites to be limited in showing that site. > 3- Your Extention (AdGuard) causes some videos not to be played in the site player (by activating the Privacy in AdGuard) Example: https://hotmovs.com/videos/462839/hot-teen-in-yoga-pants/ > 4- Some sites, by clicking on the videos of that site, will open another site similar to the same site, such as: http://www.xxxmaturevideos.com/ ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/R7pgS4V.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/bjIvBTr.png)
